titles.title: I'm Not Ashamed to Own the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm not ashamed to own my Lord, or to defend his cause, maintain the honor of his Word, the glory of his cross.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Firm as his throne his promise stands, and he can well secure what I've committed to his hands 'til the decisive hour.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then will he own my worthless name before his Father's face, and in the new Jerusalem appoint my soul a place.{/lang-eng}
